inquiry.subtitle: Professional keigo that gets responses
inquiry.taxExplain: Foreign buyers can request exemption from Japan's 10% consumption tax. We'll draft a professional keigo email that asks the right way.
inquiry.whatToSay: What would you like to say?
inquiry.messagePlaceholder: Example: I'd like to purchase this sword. Can you ship to the US? What payment methods do you accept?
inquiry.writeInEnglish: Write in English — we'll translate it into formal Japanese (keigo).

artist.browseAll: Browse all on the market by {name}
artist.provenanceStatsLine: {works} works held in elite collections across {provenances} documented provenances
artist.eliteExplanation1: The elite factor measures what proportion of an artisan’s designated works reached the highest tiers—Kokuhō, Tokubetsu Jūyō, Jūyō Bunkazai, Jūyō Bijutsuhin, or Gyobutsu—using a Bayesian Beta-Binomial model that accounts for sample size.
artist.eliteExplanation2: Rather than a raw percentage, the score is the 5th-percentile lower bound of a posterior distribution. An artisan with 1 elite work out of 1 total scores near zero—the evidence is too thin—while 30 out of 30 scores high, because the pattern is unmistakable. Uncertainty is the penalty for thin data.
artist.eliteExplanation3: This artisan places in the top {pct}% of all {peers} with ranked works.
artist.provenanceExplanation1: The provenance factor measures how consistently an artisan’s works were held in historically prestigious collections—Imperial and Shogunal households, premier daimyō clans, and the great domain lords.
artist.provenanceExplanation2: Each item contributes its highest-ranking owner, scored from Imperial (10) down to Named Collector (2). The score uses a Bayesian Normal model with a conservative prior: 20 pseudoobservations at the baseline, so artisans with thin provenance records can’t rank artificially high.
artist.provenanceExplanation3: Like the elite factor, the score is the lower bound of a 95% credible interval—uncertainty penalizes small samples. This artisan places in the top {pct}% of all {peers} with documented provenance.

saved.signInDescription: Save searches to get notified of new listings, and watch specific items for price drops and restocking.
savedSearches.emptyDescription: Browse listings and save your search to get notified when new items match your criteria.
savedSearches.tipText: To save a new search, go to the {link} page, apply your filters, and click the "Save Search" button.
savedSearches.alertsDescription: Get notified when items matching your search criteria are added. Set frequency to "Instant" for immediate notifications or "Daily" for a digest.
watchlist.emptyDescription: Browse listings and click the heart icon to add items. You can then set up price drop and back-in-stock alerts.
watchlist.watchDescriptionText: Enable "Price drop" to get notified when an item's price decreases. Enable "Back in stock" on sold items to know when they become available again.
watchlist.tipText: To add items to your watchlist, browse the {link} and click the heart icon on any item.
favorites.emptyDescription: Browse the collection and click the heart icon on items you're interested in. They'll appear here for easy access.
